data.name: COVID-19 and Beyond: Navigating Top Five Concerns of Businesses
data.summary:
Top five common concerns of CEOs:

Contractual Considerations
Workforce Rationalization
Payment Collections
Demand/Supply issues
Data Privacy & Cybersecurity
data.speakers:
Ms. Payal S Kanwar, Director General, IFCCI
Ms. Priti Suri, Founder and Managing Partner, PSA
Mr. Sameer Chugh, General Counsel, Bharti Airtel
